title: Dark Mode Is A LIE!
description: On this week's episode of the Android Central Podcast, Shruti Shekar, Jerry Hildenbrand, Andrew Myrick, and Nick Sutrich discuss the pros & cons of dark mode on phones, the Google Pixel Tablet vs. the Google Nest Hub Max, the leak of Nothing's first wearable & what it means for smartwatches, review the Galaxy Z Fold 5, preview the Fairphone 5, debate Tecno's Phantom Ultimate rollable phone concept, and more! Links:Â  Dark mode is a lie - Android Central I tested the Pixel Tablet and Nest Hub Max - Android Central Nothing's first wearable - Android Central I spent a week with the Z Fold 5 - Android Central The Fairphone 5 goes official - Android Central Tecno is the latest brand to unfurl a rollable phone concept - Android Central Follow us on Twitter: @AndroidCentral @Shruti_Shekar @gbhil @AndyMyrick @Gwanatu
author: Android Central
